CSV list.
Using the XPath: //XPATH-EXAMPLE/CUSTOMER/text() will return all the text values for the customer nodes. If we use
a scalar variable instead of a recordset we will get the values in CSV format.
[[multipleScalar]] will have Mr. Jones, Mr Johnson as its value."
